title: The Very Best of Crowley | Good Omens | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video UK
comment:
I'm surprised this moment wasn't included:
Aziraphale: Crowley, you can't do 90 miles an hour in central London!
Crowley: deadass fully takes his hands off the wheel Why not?
"the best of Crowley"? Wouldn't that just be the whole show? Every scene Tennant is in? Who are we kidding?
I only recently watched this show so I’m glad the fandom is being kept alive by Amazon 😛

"the very best of crowley"
you mean every time he's on screen right? xd
description:
He's a demon with an angelic best friend and a mission to save the world, of course, he's going to be grouchy. Watch Good Omens on Prime Video.
